item.title: Reactjs UseEffect
item.description: useEffect is a hook that is used to perform side effects in function components. It is a combination of componentDidMount, componentDidUpdate, and componentWillUnmount. It is used to fetch data from the server, subscribe to events, and perform other side effects. in my case i will use useEffect to fetch data from the server first, you need to know lifecycle in reactjs secondly, you need to know how to use useEffect
